title: Calamity Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Calamity Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 154
items.arabic: ((إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي، وَأَخْلِفْ لِي خَيْرَاً مِنْهَا)).
